description: <p>The Clinic Oakleigh Road Health Centre are looking for a full time secretary to join our friendly practice in N20. Previous experience within a GP practice is desirable. Applicants must be able to demonstrate excellent I.T skills, experience of strong communication skills with an ability to pay attention to detail. They must also be able to adapt easily to changes within the NHS and the high level of demand of working in a busy GP practice.</p>
title: Secretary
